subject: URGENT: Incorrect Amount Billed in INV-9001
body:
Hello,

This is an urgent matter. Invoice INV-9001 has been billed for ₹50,963, but the approved PO 4500101 shows ₹51,600. Our payment is on hold because of this. Please resolve immediately.

Manoj Sharma
SupplyMart

Rekha Kumar

subject: Query: INV-9003 vs PO 4500103
body:

Amit Sharma
FreshSuppliers
